speaker: Tania Allard
title: Machine Learning and Scientific Computing with Python
description:
In this episode we will talk to Tania Allard about the Python community and the scientific Python ecosystem. So if you always wanted to know what is so great about Python for Machine learning and its community this episode is for you.
